entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
